TITLE: Bilateral ultrasound-guided thoracenteses, same day

INDICATION
Recurrent symptomatic pleural effusions, right and left.

ANESTHESIA / SEDATION
None beyond local anesthetic.

IMAGING
Real-time ultrasound guidance used for both sides; permanent images archived in PACS with identifiers recorded in the note.

PROCEDURE
RIGHT thoracentesis: 8th intercostal space mid-axillary; 1200 mL serous fluid removed; specimen sent.
LEFT thoracentesis: 8th intercostal space posterior-axillary; 900 mL serous fluid removed; specimen sent.

COMPLICATIONS
None. Post-procedure CXR ordered to confirm status (confirmation imaging considered routine).

DISPOSITION
Patient tolerated well. Bilateral medical necessity documented due to symptomatic effusions on both sides.
